property.name: modalButtonPosition
property.label: Button Position
property.description: Horizontal alignment for the button the user clicks on to initiate the application. Options: Left, Center, Right.

property.name: buttonText
property.label: Button Text
property.description: Text that appears on the button.

property.name: numberOfPages
property.label: Number of steps
property.description: Indicate the number of steps that should be included in the guided flow.

property.name: layout
property.label: Layout
property.datasource: 1 - Image / Step / Desc,2 - Step / Desc / Image,3 - Step / Image / Desc
property.description: Select from 3 available layouts: Application Title, Image, Step Title, Description Application Title, Step Title, Description, Image Application Title, Step Title, Image, Description

property.name: modalSize
property.label: Application Height
property.description: Maximum height of the application window. Small is optimal for mobile.

property.name: topTitle
property.label: Application Title
property.description: Title that displays at the top of the application. If defined, this title will appear on each Step step. If empty, no application title will be displayed.

property.name: borderOn
property.label: Image Border
property.description: Select to display a border around the image and corners will be rounded.

property.name: leftAlign
property.label: Left Align Step Text
property.description: Select to left align the step text. The default alignment is center.

property.name: autoDisplay
property.label: Display Automatically
property.description: When selected, the guide will automatically display when a user accesses the page.

property.name: fieldApiName
property.label: User Preference API Name
property.description: API Name for the field on the user record. If checked, the Guide Me application will not automatically display for a user.

property.name: showAgainMessage
property.default: Do not auto-display this guide again.
property.label: User Preference Label
property.description: Message/label to display next to the “Do Not Display” checkbox on the final step. When selected, the guide will no longer automatically display for the user. If no message is specified, the checkbox will not show.

property.name: title
property.label: Step 1 Title
property.description: Title for this Step. If blank, no title will display.

property.name: imageSrc
property.label: Step 1 Image URL
property.description: Link for the image that will be displayed as part of this Step.

property.name: description
property.label: Step 1 Text
property.description: Detailed text istruction for the user. Rich text. If blank, no text will display.
